description: Remove dagesh from shin, add note 't'.
refuni: mem hiriq dehi shin shin-dot dagesh patah dalet dagesh patah yod
changeuni: mem hiriq dehi shin shin-dot patah dalet dagesh patah yod
notes: The LC has no obvious dagesh in the shin this word, מִשַׁדַּי. The Miqra according to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh in the shin.
The text is in poor condition here.

refuni: mem hiriq shin shin-dot dagesh patah dalet dagesh patah merkha yod
changeuni: mem hiriq shin shin-dot patah dalet dagesh patah merkha yod
notes: The LC has no dagesh in the shin this word, מִשַׁדַּי. The Miqra according to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh in the shin.

description: Add geresh muqdam to initial vav. Add note 't'.
refuni: vav sheva nun hiriq pe sheva lamed qamats alef revia vav holam tav
changeuni: vav sheva geresh-muqdam nun hiriq pe sheva lamed qamats alef revia vav holam tav
notes: The geresh muqdam is very faint at the top left of the initial vav. It appears to be doubled, possibly the outer edges of a single stroke.

description: Remove the dagesh from the tsadi.
refuni: mem hiriq tsadi dagesh hiriq nun dagesh hiriq merkha yod final-mem
changeuni: mem hiriq tsadi hiriq nun dagesh hiriq merkha yod final-mem
notes: No evidence for a dagesh in the tsadi is available.
BHL has no dagesh in the tsadi. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Consider adding a transcription note 't' because revia over bet is obscured by a rafe.
refuni: ayin patah geresh-muqdam kaf dagesh qamats bet hiriq revia yod shin shin-dot
changeuni: ayin patah geresh-muqdam kaf dagesh qamats bet hiriq revia yod shin shin-dot
notes: The revia is visible in the left edge of the (untranscribed) rafe.
BHL has a revia over the bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change dehi under vav to meteg; change merkha under tav to meteg with an 'm' note.
refuni: vav dagesh dehi lamed sheva het patah tet dagesh qamats alef tav hiriq merkha yod
changeuni: vav dagesh meteg lamed sheva het patah tet dagesh qamats alef tav hiriq meteg yod
notes: The mark under the vav, currently transcribed as a dehi, is not sufficiently inclined to be taken as either a tipeha or dehi. The dehi in the previous text will be transcribed as a meteg. The merkha under the tav is not sufficiently inclined to be transcribed as a merkha. The merkha in the previous text will be transcribed as a meteg with an 'm' note.
BHL has a meteg under the vav and a merkha under the tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change meteg under alef to tipeha.
refuni: vav sheva alef tsere meteg tav qamats nun hiriq munah yod final-mem
changeuni: vav sheva alef tsere tipeha tav qamats nun hiriq munah yod final-mem
notes: The mark under the alef is clearly inclined northwest-to-southeast.
BHL has a tipeha under the alef. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

refuni: vav dagesh meteg tav sheva dalet patah kaf dagesh sheva alef vav dagesh nun patah merkha nun hiriq yod
changeuni: vav dagesh meteg tav sheva dalet patah kaf dagesh alef vav dagesh nun patah merkha nun hiriq yod
notes: An erasure under the kaf is apparent.
BHL has no sheva under the kaf. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change meteg under shin to merkha.
refuni: vav dagesh geresh-muqdam tav sheva shin shin-dot meteg vav dagesh bet holam tav tsere yod kaf segol revia final-mem
changeuni: vav dagesh geresh-muqdam tav sheva shin shin-dot merkha vav dagesh bet holam tav tsere yod kaf segol revia final-mem
notes: The mark below the shin has the distinct northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha.
BHL has a merkha under the shin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change meteg under first bet to merkha.
refuni: bet dagesh patah meteg mem dagesh hiriq dalet sheva bet dagesh qamats revia resh
changeuni: bet dagesh patah merkha mem dagesh hiriq dalet sheva bet dagesh qamats revia resh
notes: The mark under the first bet has a distinct northeast-to-southwest inclination.
BHL has a merkha under the first bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

refuni: dalet dagesh tsere ayin hiriq munah yod
changeuni: dalet tsere ayin hiriq munah yod
notes: No sign of a dagesh is visible in the dalet.
BHL has no dagesh in the dalet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Move ole from over yod to over ayin.
refuni: vav sheva meteg yod patah ole ayin hataf-patah bet holam merkha dalet vav dagesh
changeuni: vav sheva meteg yod patah ayin hataf-patah ole bet holam merkha dalet vav dagesh
notes: The ole is clearly over the ayin.
BHL has an ole over the ayin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Change merkha under lamed to meteg. Add note 'm'. Remove maqaf at end of word.
notes: A maqaf may have been erased at the end of this word. The erasure has "dented" the top of the nun.
BHL has a merkha under the lamed and no maqaf at the end of the word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Remove the revia above the bet.
refuni: tav qamats geresh-muqdam bet hiriq revia yod final-nun
changeuni: tav qamats geresh-muqdam bet hiriq yod final-nun
notes: The only mark above the bet is a rafe which is not ordinarily transcribed here.
BHL has no revia above the bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

description: Move darga under vav to under the yod.
refuni: vav patah darga yod dagesh holam samekh segol final-pe
changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh darga holam samekh segol final-pe
notes: The text is in poor condition here. A faint patah can be seen under the vav. A faint darga can be seen directly under the yod.
BHL has a darga under the yod. BHLA has no entry for this verse.
